attributes.title: It’s Not Worth It.
attributes.review: Not only did the app take FOREVER to download, but the quality of it isn’t as great as you’d imagine. I expected to see great and useful information on how this country could improve with Donald Trump’s mood presidency but it didn’t show me anything useful at all. This app was a waste of space and a waste of my time. If you’re thinking of down it, DON’T DO IT. 🚫✨

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: if I could rate this zero stars I would, took forever to download and made my phone crash! It put a virus on my phone and I started to get weird messages. I’ve seen other reviews like this, if this is a common thing this app should be banned. Thank god for tik tok for telling me that this app was the reason for the virus on my phone or I would’ve never known!

attributes.title: JUST 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: THIS APP IS AWUL. I got it and then when i tried to open up the app it just kicked me off, then i kept trying to get on it and when I finally did i saw that the app was by far THE WORST APP I’VE EVER DOWNLOADED. And then the app crashed and I couldn’t get on it for like a week. So then i just decided to delete it because it wasn’t working. I suggest to not get the app, it’s just a waste of time.

attributes.title: This app is terrible!!
attributes.review: First I open the app... after waiting FOREVER for it to download and nothing will load!! All I wanted to do was buy some trump gear and support my amazingly old orange president and I couldn’t!! This app was a complete nightmare! The only reason I’m here is because I heard about this amazing app on a tic toc. The rally tickets were supposedly cheap so I figured mise  well but mine while I can...

attributes.title: These kids are just trying to get rid of it so they can keep TikTok
attributes.review: This app is actually pretty good🙂 their is nothing wrong with it... people are lying to get it banned🤡

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this app took 4 hours to download😾 i wanted to get my free tickets to the amazing rallies that definitely won’t give you covid but it was so confusing 🙈it took my another 6 hours to get my tickets 🤯then i found out i couldn’t go because i needed to walk my fish ✨🐟 the app is the worst app I have ever downloaded and this took away my vote i november 💅🏼

attributes.title: Don’t believe the bogus reviews
attributes.review: This app took less than a minute to download. Articles keep me up to date with the madness that is DEMOCRAT! No fake news here!

attributes.title: Don’t download this app👎🏾🤢🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: This app was for me to obviously show support. However it took 6 days to download and that wasn’t even the worst part! When I finally opened it, it crashed. Then again, and again! There is no excuse for why an app should cause such a burden to the consumer, and I would not recommend getting this app🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮 easy one star

attributes.title: Where is my grandma...???!!!
attributes.review: I  have the app to support my amazing president......🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 in the first article was on there was titled grandma runs for president... so I obviously pressed on it but when I did it a gas 💨💨💨are coming on my phone made me pass out and when I woke up my grandmother was not there I saw a tracking her phone and was headed straight to DC I don’t know where she’s going please send help 🆘🆘🆘...

attributes.title: This app was honestly bad quality.
attributes.review: I love our one and only ✨ 𝓵𝓸𝓿𝓮𝓭 ✨president, and I want to support him as much and possible because he 𝓭𝓮𝓼𝓮𝓻𝓿𝓮𝓼 what’s coming in his future 😏 and it really took 3 days to download and took up all of my phone storage and when I opened it all that happens is his side profile came up and I got very 😡 𝓪𝓷𝓰𝓻𝔂 🤬 because it was disrecpectful.
